1270810.name: G String Original Soundtrack
1270810.description:
This is the OST of the game G-STRING. I plan to remix it for the Ultimate Edition relaunch of the game.

128 tracks arranged into a seamless 5 hour and 45 minute long experience.

For convenience the mix has been divided into separate FLAC (lossless) files.

All tracks have been mixed together with sounds and dialog from the game to create a lengthy, smooth experience that evokes the events and mood of G-String.

I am only affiliated with and will update/remix the G String OST and G String SAMPLE OST on Steam.
